FuncDef:
The trust 8021p inbound  vxlan-mode command configures 802.1p-based BA classification for VXLAN packets.
The undo trust 8021p inbound vxlan-mode command cancels 802.1p-based BA classification for VXLAN packets.
By default, 802.1p-based BA classification for VXLAN packets is not configured.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv4 address family view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure 802.1p-based BA classification for VXLAN packets when VXLAN packets are forwarded out of a VXLAN tunnel and the outbound interface of the route is a sub-interface, run the trust 8021p vxlan-mode command.
Prerequisites
The trust upstream inbound vxlan-mode command has been configured.
Precautions
If both a physical interface and bridge domain are configured with BA classification, the BA classification in the BD view preferentially takes effect.
